entry.title: How the mind-splitting world of Severance comes together on Mac
entry.summary: How Geoff Richman, lead editor on the Apple Original, “Severance,” created the frenetic world of the hit show’s season two finale.

entry.title: Meet four of this year’s Swift Student Challenge winners
entry.summary: Meet Taiki Hamamoto, Marina Lee, Luciana Ortiz Nolasco, and Nahom Worku, four winners of Apple’s 2025 Swift Student Challenge.

entry.title: Meet four emerging filmmakers bending cultural and creative lines with iPhone 16 Pro Max
entry.summary: From a horror-comedy in Tamil to a magical romance in Malayalam, MAMI Select filmmakers are redefining cinema with iPhone 16 Pro Max.

entry.title: Capturing paradise: Karston Tannis re-creates island vibes with iPhone 16 Pro Max
entry.summary: Captured on iPhone 16 Pro Max, a recent shoot by photographer Karston Tannis showcased the vibrancy of the African diaspora.
